contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Mayor | Dr Abdollah Ramezanzadeh<br><small>عبدالله رمضان‌زاده|عبدالله رمضان‌زاده</small> | name= Abdollah Ramezanzadeh <br/>{{lang|fa|عبدالله رمضان‌زاده}} | birth_date={{birth date and age|1954|08|23}} | birth_place=[[Tehran]], [[Iran]] {{flagicon|Iran}} | spouse= | alma_mater=[[Katholieke Universiteit Leuven]] | religion=[[Shia Islam]] | party= [[Green Party of Iran]] }} '''Abdollah Ramezanzadeh''' ([[:fa:عبدالله رمضان‌زاده|عبدالله رمضان‌زاده]] in [[Persian language|Persian]]), is an [[Kurdish people|Kurdish]] academic, writer and politician. He is the former [[spokesman]] and secretary of the government of the [[Islamic Republic of Iran]] during the presidency of [[Muhammad Khatami]]. Ramezanzadeh is an [[assistant professor]] in faculty of Law and Political Science of [[University of Tehran]], and a member of [[Islamic Iran Participation Front]]. He was the governor of the [[Kurdistan Province (Iran)|Kurdistan Province]] of Iran from 1997 to 2001. In 1996, Ramezanzadeh got his [[doctorate|PhD]] from [[Katholieke Universiteit Leuven]], [[Belgium]]. His thesis entitles ''"Internal and international dynamics of ethnic conflict: the case of Iran"''. ==Opposition== Dr. Ramezanzadeh was arrested a few hours after the 2009 disputed presidential election. Yet he has been charged with participating with protests. Shortly before his arrest, Dr. Ramezanzadeh released a historic speech posted on the opposition web sites and distributed throughout Iran and all over the world. He was in solitary confinement for 4 months and sentenced to 6 years jail. He is among the Iranian activists for the ethnic groups rights and the head of the Iranian Kurdish Reformists. == External links == * [http://www.bbc.co.uk/persian/iran/story/2006/02/060219_jb_spokesman-trial.shtml Ramezanzadeh is facing trial in Iran] (BBC Persian) {{Authority control|VIAF=24883574}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Ramezanzadeh, Abdollah | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Iranian politician | DATE OF BIRTH =1954-08-23 | PLACE OF BIRTH =[[Tehran]], [[Iran]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Ramezanzadeh, Abdollah}} [[Category:Iranian government spokesmen]] [[Category:Iranian governors]] [[Category:Iranian democracy activists]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:1954 births]] [[Category:Katholieke Universiteit Leuven alumni]] [[Category:Islamic Iran Participation Front politicians]] {{Iran-politician-stub}}
